items.title: About the Partner Center Console
items.description: Welcome to the TikTok Shop Partner Center Console end user documentation! The [Partner Center Console](https://partner-sso.tiktok.com/account/login) is the web application used by TikTok Shop Partners of all types to create and manage the services they offer to sellers and creators, and streamline daily operations. The TikTok Shop Partner Center Console simplifies collaboration processes and offers valuable insights into your business. If you're just getting started and haven't yet determined wh...

items.title: Developer
items.description: # What is a Developer? Using the TikTok Shop APIs, developers build applications that offer sellers solutions to automate, manage and grow their businesses on TikTok Shop. Via the TikTok Shop Partner Center, we provide a comprehensive set of technical tools, resources, and APIs that allow developers to integrate directly with TikTok Shop. Our APIs span the entirety of the seller operation process, allowing developers to create integrations that can streamline merchant workflows and improve custo...

items.title: TikTok Shop Partner (TSP)
items.description: # What is TikTok Shop Partner (TSP) ？ TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) offer a range of services to sellers, including operational mentoring, content creation, and shop management, enabling sellers to scale their businesses on TikTok Shop effectively. Click to learn more about [TSP service categories](64f1989064ed2e0295f3c1b5#TSP) # What are the benefits of becoming a TSP on TikTok Shop？ **New Leads** * Have the opportunity to be recommended to suitable sellers and brands **Service Market Discovery**...

items.title: Creator Agency Partner (CAP)
items.description: # What is Creator Agency Partner (CAP)? Creator Agency Partner (CAP) incubates and supports creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. These agencies either manage, represent, or have access to creator talents in the US and serve TikTok Shop by acquiring, educating, and incubating creators to produce Short Video + LIVE e-co content at scale. # What are the benefits of becoming a CAP on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * CAP can gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with...

items.title: Non-US TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP)
items.description: The Affiliate Partner program is currently available in **Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, United Kingdom** ## What is a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner？ Affiliate partners offer matchmaking services for both sellers and creators and assist sellers in distributing and promoting products through dedicated product campaigns. 📌 Check to add a new service category [here](64f19887dc7f3e028d381064). Please choose" **Seller and Scalable Creator Match-up"** as your service category ## ...

items.title: US TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP)
items.description: # Overview This guide covers how agencies can use Partner Campaigns to create campaigns between Sellers and Creators. With this tool, Sellers can register and submit products to an agency's campaign, and determine the commission they would like to offer to the agency. Then the agency chooses the commission they would like to set for the managed or unmanaged Creators they've selected for the campaign. Agencies share product links with the Creators so they can add the products to their showcases a...

items.title: Multi-Channel Network (MCN)
items.description: # What is Multi-Channel Network (MCN)? Multi-Channel Network (MCN) incubate and support creators within the TikTok Shop ecosystem. This type of partner supports creators in various aspects, including shoppable video content creation, shoppable livestream operations, and creator-product matchmaking for affiliate programs. # What are the benefits of becoming a MCN on TikTok Shop？ **Collaboration Opportunities** * MCN members gain access to exciting collaboration opportunities with renowned sellers...

items.title: Register as a service partner
items.description: **Updating Phone**📌 This is a guide to register as a service partner. It's applicable for CAP, MCN, TAP, and TSP. If you are a developer, please [see the developer guide](64f1993d9495ef0281851694). # Getting Started on TikTok Shop Partner Center ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/ab3349b3334b492bb6867a5a4a5476a0~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ## Step 1: Create an account Create an account with your email and password. Phone number is optional. 📌 Please keep in...

items.title: [US] Agency Partner Onboard Guide
items.description: TikTok Shop Partner Center（US Market) : [https://partner.us.tiktokshop.com/](https://partner.us.tiktokshop.com/) # Onboarding Workflow ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/b4a0e2779d4e47b6b301d2561cfb866e~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) # Step 1: Register an account You can register an account with Email, Phone number (optional), and password. **Please note that* the *email address is* critical *and will be used to receive platform emails. Please make sure this i...

items.title: [US] Service Category- Shop Registration
items.description: # **Introduction** The Shop Registration service category empowers TSPs to streamline the process of referring sellers to TikTok Shop through automated referral link generation and link management. The service category is open to both Local-to-Local (operating locally in the U.S.) and Cross-Border (operating outside the U.S.) partners. # **Step by Step guide** ## U.S. Entity Partners ### **For new partners** New partners can directly follow the instructions in the **U.S. Agency Partner Onboard G...

items.title: Partner service categories
items.description: Service categories are predefined groupings that help organize and categorize the various services offered by partners on TikTok Shop Partner Center. These categories make it easier for TikTok Shop sellers to find relevant services that align with their needs and goals. Partners can select the appropriate service category when creating a service to ensure it's listed in the relevant section of the App & Service Store, making it more discoverable to potential clients. 📌 The service categories ava...

items.title: Partner registration application requirement
items.description: # MCN/ CAP IF you are MCN/CAP, Please choose "Creator management" as Business category ### **Common Qualification information** Common qualification information will keep same for different categories . You only need to fill in one time while onboard. If you want to apply for the new category, common qualification information will be automatically reused and you don't need to fill in again. | **Field** | **Format** | **Remarks** | | --- | --- | --- | | Full company name | Text | requires the nam...

items.title: Edit certification details
items.description: ## 🔥 **Product Overview** ### **Why do we support partners editing the certification details？** Currently, the partner is required to provide certification details to join TTSPC. Once the platform has reviewed and approved certification details, these certification details cannot be changed. However, there may be instances where a partner needs to update their certification details, such as their name, logo, etc. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/64d2ad25a8...

items.title: [SEA] Creator Level for Partners
items.description: In this article, we’ll show teach you how to navigate and use the Creator Level system to support your future partnerships with Affiliate Creators. To get you started, we will go over the following: * What is Creator Level? * Why Do We Show Creator Level to Partners? * Where to find the Creator's Levels in the Partner Center **The tasks and benefits shown in the screenshots may not reflect the current version of Creator Level. Please check your Partner Center for the most up-to-date list.* # Wha...

items.title: [US] TikTok Shop Partner Tiering Mechanism
items.description: The TikTok Shop Partners('TSP') tiering system is designed to cultivate a robust ecosystem, set service benchmarks, and offer customized resources for TSP at various development stages—thereby guiding their growth path. *This Tiering Mechanism only applies to TikTok Shop Partners certified and operating in the US market.* # **Rules for TSP Tiering** ## **2.1 TSP Tiers** **For regular type TSPs** TSPs will be divided into 6 tiers from V0 to V5, corresponding to the V0 TSP->V1 Certified TSP->V2 Br...

items.title: Create and publish a service
items.description: # What is a TikTok Shop Service? A TikTok Shop Service is an offering created by a partner through TikTok Shop Partner Center. It serves as an introduction to the partner's capabilities and acts as an online service invitation extended to TikTok Shop sellers. These services can be made public, available for all sellers to see and authorize (Public Service), or they can be shared privately with specific sellers the partner has already connected with (Custom Service). There are two types of servic...

items.title: Listing your service on the App & Service Store
items.description: 📌 The **App & Service Store** features services and apps tailored to help sellers in efficiently managing and growing their businesses. Thus, only services catering to sellers can be showcased on the App & Service Store. Note that only TSPs (TikTok Shop Partners) can list their services in the app store, given their role in supporting sellers. # Considerations before listing your service ## Service discoverability Discoverability of your service on the **App & Service Store** depends on three ke...

items.title: Edit  your app and service
items.description: ## **🔥 Optimization Overview** ## Why do we build this feature? For ISV and TSP, they are not able to change product information once the service has been published online. This brings inconvenience for TSP&ISV to build authorization with a new Seller. ## ⭐️ **Key updates** ### Support ISV & Cross border TSP to add new Seller Market If you want to add a new target seller to your public/custom service, you can go to service detail page and click edit seller type You can add a new seller type or d...

items.title: Seller Leads Pool
items.description: # What is Seller Leads Pool? The Seller Leads Pool helps TSP receive qualified seller inquiries and choose which businesses to connect with based on detailed information. TSP can see key business details like company size, GMV, and category to help make informed decisions about potential partnerships. **Key Features & Benefits:** * Quality Leads: Service Partners can review seller business profiles and requirements before deciding to connect * Full Control: Service Partners can choose which inqu...

items.title: Steps to Get Service Authorization
items.description: # Overview ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/445e9bfad3aa4e67867c3a6c501d46f9~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ### Step 1 TSP publishes a public/custom service Please refer to the [user guide](64f198a193f5dc028e35505f) to publish a service before starting authorization ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c51be7ab1237443799d36c8245c3f92c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ### Step 2 TSP Share the authorization link with Seller Clic...

items.title: Management- Manage authorizations
items.description: # Introduction The Shop Management page is where partners can view and manage all their authorizations with sellers. # Guide Once the seller has authorized Apps or Services, DTSP will be able to check and manage authorization on the *Seller Management - Manage* Authorize *page* Tips: Partners can use the filters below to locate specific authorizations. eg authorization ID, service name, shop name/code/id ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/07f8649b1dbb422a926...

items.title: TSP Access Feature
items.description: ## **Background** TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) are e-commerce service providers focused on Seller Service (Shop Management, LIVE Management, Short Video Management, Seller Affiliate Management). They often need to log into the seller center to assist merchants with their daily activities. However, there are a couple of significant challenges. For example, TSPs face the inconvenience of juggling multiple sub-accounts when performing operations on behalf of sellers. To streamline the way TSPs reque...

items.title: TSP Access Seller-Creator IM
items.description: # **Steps to use Seller-Creator IM** TSP can utilize the features of Seller-Creator IM if authorized for Full Access or Affiliation. After logging into the Seller Center via TSP Access, on the “Affiliate” page, click the “Go to Affiliate Center Home” button to enter the Affiliate Center. Once in the Affiliate Center, TSPs can use Creator IM just like sellers do through 5 entrances. Please refer to the [Seller - Creator IM User Guide](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?course_type=1&fr...

items.title: [MY] TSP Service Report
items.description: # **Overview** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to merchants, the platform are now supporting TSP to upload service information to the platform. Your account manager will be able to check your service information and further performance checking. # **Feature introduction** ### Step 1 Click the "service report" after getting authorization After getting authorization from the seller, TSP can start to input their service report details with the seller. | **[Manage Authorization]** *...

items.title: [US] TSP Service Details
items.description: # **Summary** To better measure the actual contribution of TSP to the Seller, the platform is now supporting TSP to upload Service Details. The platform will be able to check your information to verify your service. **Please note:** You can still work with the seller without service details. However, only authorizations with approved service details will be recognized as valid for GMV performance and will qualify for further platform incentives. # **Feature introduction** ## Step 1: Click the "S...

items.title: [US TSP] TSP Service Offer
items.description: # What is the Service Offer？ TSP Service allows TSPs to bundle service lists and offer authorization details for sellers to review and authorize. TSP will have two options to get authorization from the seller. **Option 1: Default authorization application** TSPs can share the “Default authorization application” link with the seller. The seller will need to select authorization details **Option 2: Prefill service offer [NEW]** TSPs can offer authorization details by clicking "pre-fill service off...

items.title: [US TSP] Manage Company Profile
items.description: Please note: This feature is currently in beta testing and is only available to selected TSPs by invitation. If you're interested in using it, please reach out to your account manager. # Introduction: What is the TSP Company Profile? To improve matchmaking efficiency between sellers and TSPs and help merchants to form a comprehensive understanding of TSPs, the TSP profile feature includes the following key functions: 1. Allows TSPs to manage their company profile information on the TikTok Shop P...

items.title: Steps to cancel authorization for TSP
items.description: # Introduction This tool allows TSPs to request the cancellation of service authorization. If the seller agrees to the cancellation or fails to respond within 72 hours, the authorization will be automatically terminated. # Step 1: TSP raises a cancellation request TSP can navigate to ++TikTok Shop Partner Center-> Seller Management++ and click terminate++ ++to raise a cancel authorization request. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/6ef558997b7f4b6d95f1e7e55d...

items.title: [US] TSP Online Signing Process
items.description: # Introduction: What is TSP Online Signing? TSP Online Signing is a feature that allows TSPs to establish online signing relationships with sellers. # What are the benefits？ * **Smoother Workflow:** TSPs can initiate a service proposal, which the seller can then review and confirm. * **Official Signing:** By detailing service specifics and related information, TSPs can establish official signing relationships with sellers, ensuring clear communication and agreed-upon terms. # What's the workflow...

items.title: [US]Expand to All 3 Partner Services to Unlock Tier Growth & Benefits
items.description: Dear Partner, We encourage you to expand and activate all three partner service categories in Partner Center: **Creator Matchmaking, Seller Service,** and **Creator Service.** Doing so allows you to unlock more collaboration opportunities and can help you grow your business more effectively. By offering more comprehensive services, you not only provide end-to-end support to sellers and creators but also improve the chances of reaching a higher TSP Tier. Partners offering a single service have th...

items.title: Creator Management - Find Creators
items.description: **This feature is only available for** [MCN/CAP](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/YVSSdFlS4olNfdxSPjecs8kYnOg) **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG ## What is Affiliate Marketplace？ The Creator Marketplace helps MCN/CAP discover and partner with TikTok’s Creator community. ## How It Works？ * The Creator Marketplace is a set of features that enable MCN/CAP to connect and collaborate with Creators. * MCN/CAP can view the contact information of the creator or send an invita...

items.title: Creator Management - Linked Creators
items.description: **This feature is only available for** [MCN/CAP](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/YVSSdFlS4olNfdxSPjecs8kYnOg) **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: US, UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG ## What is linked Creator? Creator Management is a set of features that enable MCN/CAP to check and manage creator partnership/data/fee agreement linking relationships in an official way. ## Feature Introduction To build partnerships with creators, you can go to [creator management]➤ [manage partnerships] page and manage ...

items.title: Creator Management - Find Creators (US)
items.description: ## **What is Find Creators？** Find creators helps CAPs discover and partner with TikTok’s Creator community. ## **How It Works？** * Find creators is a set of features that enable CAPs to connect and collaborate with Creators. * CAPs can view the contact information of the creator or send an invitation with one click. * CAPs can search for creators by using filters such as Creators, Followers, and Performance. ## **What type of creator can be found on Find Creators？** Creators who have e-commerce...

items.title: Creator Management - Fee Agreement/Commission Sharing
items.description: **This feature is only available for** [MCN/CAP](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/YVSSdFlS4olNfdxSPjecs8kYnOg) **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG ## What is commission sharing feature？ In short, a partner that opens a MCN-Creator sharing can obtain a certain percentage of the creator's affiliate commission through the fee agreement with the creator, and after the creator earns the commission, the commission will be automatically credited to the partner's bank card (loc...

items.title: Creator Management - Linking with Creators for Data Authorization & Commission Sharing (US ONLY)
items.description: # Overview We are making collecting management fees from creators a more seamless experience by including commission sharing as part of our onboarding process in the TikTok Shop Partner Center. You can now link accounts, authorize data sharing, and set up commission sharing in a single request. It's now even easier to start working with your creators and earn revenue sooner. When setting up a creator relationship, you'll establish the fee agreement rate you're taking from the creator's TikTok Sh...

items.title: Agency - Creator Instant Messaging (IM)
items.description: **Note:** *Agency-Creator IM is available to* ***Creator Agency Partners (CAP)*** *and/or* ***TikTok Shop Affiliate Partners (TAP)*** *- manage and work directly with creators.* # Overview Connect directly with creators through TikTok Shop's Agency-Creator IM system. Send instant messages within the platform - no external messaging needed. Track creator engagement seamlessly. * **Build Direct Relationships** - Send invites, negotiate, and collaborate in one place for faster results * **Streamlin...

items.title: Product Management
items.description: 📌 **This feature is only available for** MCN, CAP, TAP **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: US,UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG # What is Product Management？ Product management includes **Product Marketplace** and **Product Sets** which allow you to: 1. **Find and select products:** you can view/search/filter products according to your needs in the product marketplace 2. **Create your product set and share with creator:** you can create a product set and share with your creator using one link 📌 **Note**...

items.title: CAP Agency LIVE Commission (US)
items.description: # Overview This introduction provides an overview of new product features enabling CAP Agencies to establish exclusive LIVE commission-sharing agreements. The new fee agreement for LIVE empowers CAP Agencies to collaborate with their bound Creators, driving LIVE business growth while ensuring a dedicated revenue stream for providing LIVE-focused services. # How to set up LIVE commission sharing? ### Set up LIVE commission with new Creators #### Step I: CAP Agencies set up a fee agreement * Login...

items.title: TikTok Shop developer guide
items.description: Welcome to the Developer Guide for the TikTok Shop API. The TikTok Shop API provides programmatic access to the TikTok Shop platform for TikTok Shop application and service integrators. If you're just getting started, we recommend you start with the TikTok Shop API [Get started overview](/4n48cxi1/tts-developer-types). You can learn more about [Developer onboarding](/4n48cxi1/developer-onboarding), and how to get access to Seller data in the [Authorization overview (202407)](/4n48cxi1/authorizat...

items.title: Get Order Detail
items.description: # Path: /order/202507/orders # Method: [GET] # Function Description Get the detailed order information of an order, including important attributes such as order status, shipping addresses, payment details, price and tax info, and package information. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Proper...

items.title: Get Order List
items.description: # Path: /order/202309/orders/search # Method: [POST] # Function Description Returns a list of orders created or updated during the timeframe indicated by the specified parameters. You can also apply a range of filtering criteria to narrow the list of orders returned, such as order status, delivery option type, and buyer user ID. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef028185...

items.title: Get Warehouse Delivery Options
items.description: # Path: /logistics/202309/warehouses/{warehouse_id}/delivery_options # Method: [GET] # Function Description This API is used to obtain a list of delivery options available through the seller's designated warehouse. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | ---...

items.title: Get Package Shipping Document
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/{package_id}/shipping_documents # Method: [GET] # Function Description For orders shipped by TikTok Shop, this API retrieves the URL of shipping documents (shipping label and packing slip) for a package specified by the package ID. This API is only applicable to "TikTok Shipping" orders. To obtain the shipping documents URL via this API, first call "Ship Package" to ship the corresponding package. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How t...

items.title: Batch Ship Packages
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/ship # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to batch ship packages by providing multiple package IDs. This API is available for TikTok shipping orders as well as seller shipping orders. * `TikTok Shipping`: Schedule a package handover time for TikTok Shipping carriers to pickup a package from the Seller. * `Seller Shipping`: Seller arranges their own shipping, and upload a `tracking_number` and `shipping_provider_id`. Package ID can be obtained ...

items.title: Update Shipping Info
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/orders/{order_id}/shipping_info/update # Method: [POST] # Function Description If the seller entered an incorrect tracking number, this API allows the seller to update the tracking number and shipping provider for an order that has already been shipped. * This API is only applicable to orders (or packages) shipped by the seller. * It is only used to update the tracking number and shipping provider for packages that have already been shipped. * For orders that have bee...

items.title: Ship Package
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/{package_id}/ship # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to ship a package. There are two kinds of shipping options available: `TikTok Shipping` or `Seller Shipping`. * `TikTok Shipping`: Schedule a package handover time for TikTok Shipping carriers to pickup a package from seller. * `Seller Shipping`: Seller arranges their own shipping, and uploads a tracking number and `shipping_provider_id`. Package ID can be obtained from [Get Order Detail](...

items.title: Mark Package As Shipped
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/orders/{order_id}/packages # Method: [POST] # Function Description **This API is currently exclusive to the following markets: US, UK, ES, IE, IT, DE, FR, JP.** This API is for sellers who fulfill orders through their own selected/preferred logistics carrier, and allows sellers to upload valid package information (items in packages, shipping provider information, and tracking number) orders/order line items to TikTok Shop. Use [Get Shipping Providers API](https://part...

items.title: Search Combinable Packages
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/combinable_packages/search # Method: [GET] # Function Description Use this API to query orders eligible for combined shipping. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GC...

items.title: Split Orders
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/orders/{order_id}/split # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to confirm an order split. Note that supported split levels vary by region: * Some regions support item-level splits (splitting individual units of the same SKU). * Others only support all-units splits (splitting different SKUs into separate packages). Here are two examples of supported splits: * **Case 1**: all-units split, applicable for orders in BR, SEA, MX (local sellers) Split a buyer o...

items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/{package_id} # Method: [GET] # Function Description Returns information about a package, including handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider information. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- ...

Warehouse information includes name, status, address, and other details. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --...

Package creation time and information update time are the common querying conditions. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --...

items.title: Update Package Delivery Status
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/deliver # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to update the delivery status of the package from in transit status. Please note that only sellers utilizing the SOF( Seller Own Fleet) capability can use this API to update the package status to 'DELIVERED'. This API is only available for the SEA region. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/pa...

items.title: Create Packages
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to ship orders (purchase labels). This API is region specific to the US. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Based on the package attributes, options listed below may differ from your shipping subscriptions. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://part...

items.title: Get Eligible Shipping Service
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/orders/{order_id}/shipping_services/query # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API ( for US ) to query the list of available shipping services when specifying packages' size or weight. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Options listed may differ if you change the package attributes at the time of shipping. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call...

items.title: Update Package Shipping Info
items.description: # Path: /fulfillment/202309/packages/{package_id}/shipping_info/update # Method: [POST] # Function Description If the seller entered an incorrect tracking number, this API allows the seller to update the tracking number and shipping provider for a package that has already been shipped. Attention: This API is only applicable to orders (or packages) shipped by the seller. It is only used to update the tracking number and shipping provider for packages that have already been shipped. --- # Common P...

items.title: Get Shipping Providers
items.description: # Path: /logistics/202309/delivery_options/{delivery_option_id}/shipping_providers # Method: [GET] # Function Description This API is used to obtain the shipping provider corresponding to the specified delivery option --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | ...

items.title: Listing quality diagnosis
items.description: High-quality product listings are essential for improving visibility and building customer trust. TikTok Shop provides APIs that diagnose product content and offer recommendations for optimization, covering areas such as text, image, and search engine optimization (SEO). **For unlisted new products** - [Check Product Listing API (v202309)](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0ee8f1fd3102b91c6493): Use this API to diagnose new products in advance before listing. **For existing products*...

items.title: Customer engagement API overview
items.description: Customer engagement is crucial for businesses looking to build lasting relationships with their customers and drive conversions. Therefore, we offer a suite of Customer Engagement API endpoints that enable businesses to integrate their CRM platforms with TikTok Shop to capitalize on TikTok's extensive reach. Benefits of integrating with TikTok Shop: **-** **Increased customer engagement** by reaching a vast, active user base on TikTok and engage potential customers in a platform-native way. **-*...

items.title: Customer Service API overview
items.description: # Context Customer Service refers to the communication channel used by the customer service of the sellers and buyers to communicate information about the whole process of pre-sale, in-sale and after-sale. Once the integration is done using Customer Service API, the messages from your TikTok Shop buyers will be forwarded to third party customer support system. This eliminates the need to log in to Seller Center to manage buyer messages, and allows customer service agents to reply to messages dir...

items.title: Create Target Collaboration
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202508/target_collaborations # Method: [POST] # Function Description This API is used to create a target collaboration. A target collaboration is a collaboration between a seller selected set of products (including a commission payout) and a set of creators the seller has added (invited) to the collaboration. Target collaborations are private and not visible in the Creator Marketplace to all creators; they are only visible to those that have been added to the collaborat...

items.title: Seller Search Affiliate Open Collaboration Product
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202405/open_collaborations/products/search # Method: [POST] # Function Description This API is used to search the information of products with open collaboration by category, commission rate, and keywords. It will return all products on the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace that are in an open collaboration. Sellers can only search for open collaboration within the regions they are registered to sell in. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [H...

items.title: Generate Affiliate Product Promotion Link
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202405/products/{product_id}/promotion_link/generate # Method: [POST] # Function Description The user of this API is a partner developer, on behalf of Sellers. This API is used to generate affiliate exclusive product link based on all open collaboration products available within the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace. This API generates a link, at the product ID level (which belongs to a Seller). This link, can be distributed to creators, by the partner developer...

items.title: Remove Target Collaboration
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202409/target_collaborations/{target_collaboration_id} # Method: [DELETE] # Function Description This API is used by Seller to remove affiliate target collaboration. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | ...

items.title: Get Open Collaboration Sample Rules
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202410/open_collaborations/sample_rules # Method: [GET] # Function Description Use this API to get the status and the details of the sample rules for products under an open collaboration. With this API, you can efficiently review the sample distribution criteria for products within the open collaboration context. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f1996794...

items.title: Edit Open Collaboration Sample Rule
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202410/open_collaborations/sample_rules # Method: [POST] # Function Description Use this API to manage sample rules in open collaborations, like valid time periods, or thresholds for creators to request samples. You can create, update, or deactivate rules. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | ...

items.title: Get Conversation List
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202412/conversations # Method: [GET] # Function Description Get User's Conversation list. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3 | Us...

items.title: For SEA market: Configure "Cancellation status change" webhook to receive cancellation message
items.description: Since TikTok Shop is proposing to allow buyers to cancel eligible orders between the status Ready To Ship (RTS) and Transit To Ship (TTS), please configure the "[Cancellation status change](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/11-cancellation-status-change)" webhook to receive cancellation messages. If sellers receive such a cancellation message, they need to takeout the parcel and do not ship it. This webhook's related links are as below: * "Cancellation status change" webhook: https://par...

items.title: UKEU & JP markets: Product category expansion
items.description: # Summary Recently in the SEA market, following last year's rollout in the US market, TikTok Shop introduced an increase to the levels in the category tree, from **three** to at-most **seven**, with the aim of improving product information quality. Beginning this week, we will be introducing this product category expansion in the **UK**, **EU**, and **JP** markets. This changelog will provide a quick overview of API changes you may need to implement. **For a more detailed walkthrough on how to i...

items.title: EU market: Pfand Fees and Packaging Type Data
items.description: # Summary A Pfand is a refundable deposit applied to certain products, typically beverage containers (e.g., bottles or cans), in countries with a deposit return system like Germany. The customer pays the deposit when purchasing the product and can reclaim it by returning the empty container to a designated return point. This system incentivizes recycling and proper disposal of packaging. Packaging type refers to the specific kind of container material and reusability (e.g., single-use vs. multi-...

items.title: Get Transactions by Statement
items.description: # Path: /finance/202501/statements/{statement_id}/statement_transactions # Method: [GET] # Function Description Retrieves the details of a statement, including the transactions, which can be a standard order transaction, an adjustment transaction, or a reserve-related transaction. For the SKU-level details of an order transaction, refer to [Get Transactions by Order](650a6734defece02be67d724). Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US c...

items.title: Get Transactions by Order
items.description: # Path: /finance/202501/orders/{order_id}/statement_transactions # Method: [GET] # Function Description Retrieves the SKU-level details of an order transaction. This covers transactions related to sales, fees, commissions, shipping, taxes, and refunds. Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable). --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop AP...

items.title: Recommend Category
items.description: # Path: /product/202309/categories/recommend # Method: [POST] # Function Description Retrieve the recommended category for a candidate product based on its title, description, and images. If you are syncing product catalogs from an external system to TikTok Shop, use this API to facilitate product categorization. **Note**: The language used in text fields such as descriptions and titles must align with the target market's language (e.g. don't use Chinese). --- # Common Parameters For common para...

items.title: Creator Generate General Link
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_creator/202505/affiliate_sharing_links/general_publishers/generate_batch # Method: [POST] # Function Description You can use this API to generate material sharing links for your publishers. After that, you can encapsulate the sharing link with additional information like publisher ID. Right now, the material type must be `PRODUCT`. Please ensure that the material is included in the campaign by using [Generate Multi Affiliate Partner Campaign Product Links]. --- # Common Parame...

items.title: Send IM Message
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202412/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages # Method: [POST] # Function Description The API for sending IM messages. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GCP_XF90ig...

items.title: Get Unsettled Transactions
items.description: # Path: /finance/202507/orders/unsettled # Method: [GET] # Function Description This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of unsettled transactions (incl. Orders & Adjustments) generated by a seller, returning the detailed fee breakdown for a list of order ID and adjustment ID. For now, this API only returns transactions which were created after 2025.01.01. Once one transaction is settled, which won't be returned by this API anymore, please get from Get Statement Transaction API. **Pay atte...

items.title: Seller Search Sample Applications
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202508/sample_applications/search # Method: [POST] # Function Description This API is provided for sellers to query sample applications based on various criteria such as products, creators, or application statuses. By using this API, sellers can retrieve detailed information about sample application records, including the creator's information and the specifics of each application. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - C...

items.description: # Path: /affiliate_creator/202412/samples/labels # Method: [GET] # Function Description Check if a creator can apply for a sample of a specific product. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | content-type | header | string | Y | ap...

items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202412/conversation/{conversation_id}/messages # Method: [GET] # Function Description Get chat history in one conversation. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GCP_XF9...

items.description: # Path: /finance/202309/withdrawals # Method: [GET] # Function Description Get the list of the withdrawal records (when Seller's withdraw money from TikTokShop) based on the specified date range. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top) | Properties | Location | Type | Require | Sample | Properties description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- ...

items.title: Seller Search Creator on Marketplace
items.description: # Path: /affiliate_seller/202508/marketplace_creators/search # Method: [POST] # Function Description This API is used by Sellers to search for Creators in the Creator Marketplace. Sellers can search based on filters such as GMV, keywords, and Creator follower demographics. All the data returned is for the last 30 days. --- # Common Parameters For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%...

items.title: US market: Item protection/insurance
items.description: # Summary We've updated our Order APIs to support the rollout of item protection for TikTok Shop orders. # Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * United States (US) - Local and cross-border | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | # What's new? Since TikTok Shop buyers can now purchase item protection for their order(s), we wanted to ensure our APIs reflected that as well. ## POST Get Order List and GET Order Detail For both [POST Get Order List](https://partner.tiktokshop.c...

items.title: Analytics APIs now available globally
items.description: # Summary Today, we've opened up all our analytics APIs to be available globally! Endpoints that were previously exclusive to the US, UK, and SEA can now be used to return performance metrics for any shop, regardless of market. # Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * All markets - Local and cross-border | | Impacted version(s) | * 202405 (and later) | # What's new? All existing Analytics APIs are now available in all markets. These include: – [GET Shop Performance](https://partner....

items.title: For SEA market: Get Rejection Reasons before Cancellation or Return Rejection
items.description: Since cancellation or return rejection reasons change sometimes, please call [Get Rejection Reasons](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/get-reject-reasons-202309#Back%20To%20Top) and show seller the usable rejection reason list if seller wants to reject buyer's cancellation or return request. You can get this list from the "reasons" parameter in this API's response payload. It will be effective after Sep. 24, 2025. By the way, you can get the newest [return reasons](https://partner.tiktok...

items.title: Creator Open ID for Affiliate APIs
items.description: # Summary This week, we'll be introducing the new **Creator Open ID**, a privacy-preserving identifier used in Affiliate Open APIs. Instead of exposing the plain creator ID (restricted by our privacy policy), we'll instead provide a **pseudonymous, non-reversible** Creator Open ID to external partners. ❗ Important: The Creator Open ID will be implemented with a new version of our Affiliate APIs (202509). For the time being, we will continue to support plain creator IDs simultaneously, but announ...

items.title: EU market: New compliance data required - CLP/Biocides
items.description: # Summary Starting **September 8th, 2025**, we will be introducing **new attributes in the EU market** to collect required product information from sellers who are listing **home appliance products** that contain biocides. This will ensure the correct label will be displayed to customers in compliance with EU rules. # Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * Europe (EU) - Local and cross-border | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | # What's new? To support Biocides data col...

items.title: UK and EU markets: Introducing On Time Delivery Rate (OTDR) for Shipped by Seller (3PL) Orders
items.description: # Summary **On Time Delivery Rate** (OTDR) is a measurement used to assess a seller's ability to fulfill customer orders within the promised delivery timeframe. OTDR is defined as the percentage of all packages (delivered over a period of 7 calendar days) that take less than **5 business days** to be delivered. From **August 25th, 2025**, sellers in the UK and EU using the **Shipped by Seller** (3PL) fulfillment method will receive `delivery_sla_time` data with each order, enabling better manage...

items.title: New APIs for TikTok LIVE
items.description: # Summary We've received a lot of requests to add TikTok LIVE analytics to our ever-growing TikTok Shop analytics APIs. We're happy to announce that we've recently just launched two new endpoints to address this demand! # Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * All markets - local and cross-border | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | # Changes ## New analytics APIs The following endpoints and have been newly launched: | **Endpoint** | **Description** | | --- | --- | | [GE...

items.title: ID market: Tokopedia Open API Termination - Migrate to TikTok Shop Partner Center by September 30, 2025
items.description: The **complete termination of** [Tokopedia Open API](https://developer.tokopedia.com/) **services** will be effective on **September 30, 2025**. As part of our strategic integration with the broader TikTok Shop ecosystem, we are transitioning all partner integrations to [TikTok Shop Partner Center by Tokopedia](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/) We strongly encourage all partners to immediately migrate to TTS Partner Center, where you can manage both Tokopedia and TikTok Shop operations seamlessly...

items.title: SEA market: Product category expansion
items.description: # Summary Last year in the US market, TikTok Shop rolled out an increase to the levels in the category tree, from **three** to at-most **seven**, with the aim of improving product information quality. Beginning this week, we will be introducing this product category expansion in the **SEA** market. This changelog will provide a quick overview of API changes you may need to implement. **For a more detailed walkthrough on how to implement the necessary changes, please read** [our L7 category expan...

items.title: GS POP product listing workflow revamp
items.description: # Summary On **August 19th, 2025**, we will be launching a revamp of the product listing API workflow for Global Selling Platform Open Plan (**GSPOP**) sellers in order to improve product listing efficiency and overall experience. # Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * Platform Open Plan (POP) - All markets | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | # Changes For a more detailed look at our API changes, please visit our [fields description](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.co...

items.title: For SEA Market: Recommended Default Order Sorting Logic to Support Fast Delivery Service
items.description: With the rollout of new fast delivery services across SEA (including Next Day Delivery, Instant, and Same Day), it's important to help merchants prioritize these fast delivery orders effectively. We recommend developers to update your **default sorting logic** to support merchants with better order processing prioritization. The sorting will **require 2 layers**: 1. Shipping SLA (`tts_sla_time`) 2. Logistics Priority (`fulfillment_priority_level`) For comprehensive details about this change and ...

items.title: For ID market: One Change for Privacy Improvement of Image Message
items.description: There is one change for privacy improvement of image message in Indonesian market which will be effective on September 30, 2025. When sellers check image messages (from [Customer Service API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/customer-service-api-overview)) and download images through HTTP to access the image link, they need to include two parameters * Header：x-tts-access-token * Query：shop_cipher # Which markets are affected? The updates of the requirements apply to the Local to Local s...

items.title: Draft editing support for published listings
items.description: ## Summary Previously, the TikTok Shop Seller Center only allowed draft editing prior to publishing a listing. We've recently expanded this feature to additionally enable sellers to edit and save drafts for products that have already been listed, and are now ensuring it is reflected in our APIs. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * United States (US) - Local * United Kingdom (UK) - Local * Europe (EU) - Local * Southeast Asia (SEA) - Local * Japan (JP) - Local * Platform Open P...

items.title: Updates to product errors
items.description: # **Summary** To help developers identify and handle errors better, we've refined several ambiguous error codes by either splitting them into more precise error codes, or replacing them with more appropriate error codes. These changes provide clearer context on what went wrong. The error conditions remain the same, only the codes associated with them have changed for clarity. # **Impact** | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | All | | Impacted version(s) | 202309 (and later) | # **What is ch...

items.title: SEA market only:Three Seller Initiates Cancel Reasons will be changed
items.description: # What is changing? From August 31 2025, three seller initiates cancellation reasons will be changed. 1. "seller_cancel_paid_reason_address_not_deliver" will be removed in Indonesia, Philippines, Vietnam, Malaysia and Thailand markets. 2. "seller_cancel_unable_to_deliver_to_buyer_address" will be removed in Singapore market. 3. "seller_cancel_reason_out_of_stock" will be adjusted from "Buyer Fault" to "Seller Fault" in Indonesia market. # Which markets are affected? The updates of the requiremen...

items.title: Post town added for UK recipient addresses in the Get Order Detail API
items.description: # Summary Addresses in the United Kingdom (UK) require a [Post Town](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Post_town), so we've added a data field for UK buyers to include their Post Town information. ## What's changed? To support this, we've added a new property `post_town` to the `recipient_addresses` object in the [Get Order Detail API](get-order-detail). ## Which markets are affected? This change affects the UK market only. ## Who is affected? Developers with applications that use the Get Order Deta...

items.title: Introducing new product image text translation APIs and webhook
items.description: # Summary In the EU marketplace, TikTok Sellers are required to translate all text information associated with a product, including image text. We've made this easier for our Sellers with a new a set of APIs to programmatically translate product image text to German, Irish English, Spanish, French, and Italian. ## What is changing? We've released a new asynchronous API to [create a translation task](create-image-translation-tasks) for product image translations, a new [translation status API](ge...

items.title: MX market: GS POP API Updates
items.description: ## Summary We're rolling out some updates to our Product, Fulfillment, and Return and Refund APIs in order to better support our Global Selling Platform Open Plan (GS POP) in the Mexico (MX) market. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * Mexico (MX-CB) | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | ## Changes ### Product APIs #### Product listing rules To list GS POP products for MX, call [POST Create Global Product](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/create-global-produ...

items.title: Supplementary Notice on API Deprecation: Finance APIs
items.description: Following the announcement of **V1 API deprecation** by the TikTok Shop Open Platform, we are issuing an additional clarification regarding the deprecation plan for the following two Finance category APIs: * [Get Transactions by Order](get-transactions-by-order); * [Get Transactions by Statement](get-transactions-by-statement). ## Action Required In addition to the deprecation of all V1 APIs (version number < 202309), the **202309 versions** of the above two APIs will also be included in the dep...

items.title: Deprecating TikTok Shop API V1
items.description: To better serve our global developer community, **TikTok Shop Open Platform** is committed to building a high-performance, stable, and industry-compliant API system. Currently, we offer two main versions of our Open API: * **V1 (Legacy version)**: version numbers below 202309; * **V2 (Standard version)**: version numbers 202309 and above. The V1 API was introduced in the early stages of our platform. To enhance the developer experience and improve integration compatibility, we launched the V2 ve...

items.title: BR and MX markets: Changes to name logic
items.description: ## Summary We're making some changes to the API logic in [Get Order Detail](get-order-detail) to address common issues around the different `name`-related parameters. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * Brazil (BR) * Mexico (MX) | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (and later) | ## Changes ### Get Order Detail Currently, when buyers place an order, they provide a `first_name` and `last_name` that are returned in the `recipient_address` response for Get Order Detail. The two para...

items.title: US market: Updates to mandatory attributes
items.description: ## Summary To meet compliance requirements, TikTok Shop is making compliance-related attributes mandatory across various product categories. Starting from **2025-08-30**, the Products API will require these compliance-related attributes to be provided. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | United States (US) - **Local sellers** | | Impacted version(s) | 202309 (and later) | ## Changes The following attributes in the specified categories will become mandatory. | **Compliance scenar...

items.title: JP market: Updated APIs for Products, Orders, Logistics, and Customer service
items.description: ## Summary As of today, developers can start using TikTok Shop APIs to build apps for the Japan market. The APIs and workflows are generally consistent with other regions/markets, but there are a few JP-specific updates worth calling out. **Note**: Before building order management modules, developers should familiarize themselves with our [Orders API overview](order-api-overview) and our [Fulfillment API overview](fulfillment-api-overview). ## Affected markets and versions This change applies to...

items.title: Streamlining of invite-only product categories
items.description: ## What is changing? Previously, TikTok Shop sellers had to apply for the necessary permission(s) in Seller Center to list products under invite-only categories. We've updated this workflow to allow sellers to first list such products, then apply for permission(s). Now, when a seller lists a product under an invite-only category they do not have permission for, the product will be in the `PENDING` status and unavailable to buyers. Similarly, the product audit status will be `PRE_APPROVED` if it ...

items.title: US market: Supplementary SKU images
items.description: ## Summary Previously, L2L sellers could only list a single image per product variant. We've introduced the ability to add multiple product variant images to better support our sellers. ## Affected markets and versions This change applies to the following market(s): * United States (US) This change applies to the following API version(s): * 202309 (and later) ## API changes ### Product APIs | **Endpoint(s)** | **Change(s)** | | --- | --- | | * Create Product * Edit Product * Partial Edit Product...

items.title: US, UK, and SEA markets: Pre-order and made-to-order product types
items.description: ## Summary We're introducing a couple of new `pre_sale` product types to better support TikTok Shop seller needs. There are a couple key business logic distinctions based on the market, as follows: For the **US** market, this includes pre-order and made-to-order products: * **Pre-order**: The buyer can place an order for a product before a **fixed** release date set by the seller. * **Made-to-order**: The buyer can place an order for a customized product that is made-to-order. The shipping lead ...

items.title: US market: Pre-order, made-to-order, back-order functionality; delivery SLA
items.description: ## Summary In the US market, we're adding the capability to specify new order types in our Order APIs, namely pre-order, made-to-order, and back-order. Compared to normal orders, these orders will sit longer in the **Ship To** tab of Order Management. Sellers now have the ability to filter for these new order types quickly to assess the necessary next steps in fulfillment. Specifically for back-orders, Order Management has enabled tracking and visibility against incoming inventory. Back-orders h...

items.title: US and UK markets: Exchange orders
items.description: ## Summary To provide a smoother after-sales experience, we've added a couple of response parameters that should help sellers keep track of their exchange orders. ## Affected markets and versions This change applies to the following market(s): * United States (US) * United Kingdom (UK) This change applies to the following API version(s): * 202309 (and later) ## What's changing? ### Order APIs | **Endpoint(s)** | **Change(s)** | | --- | --- | | * [Get Order List](get-order-list) * [Get Order Deta...

items.title: US market: Fast delivery program
items.description: ## Summary To better support our 2024 Q4 rollout of *3 Day Delivery* through Fulfilled-by-TikTok (FBT), we're adding a merchant badge in Seller Center that more clearly indicates if a seller is offering *3 Day Delivery* for a specific order. We've updated some of our order management APIs to reflect this badge. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | United States (US) | | Impacted version(s) | 202309 (and later) | ## Changes ### Order APIs | **Endpoint(s)** | **Change(s)** | | --- ...

items.title: US market: Changes to recipient_address masking
items.description: ## Summary We'll be making some upcoming customer data desensitization changes, specifically which `recipient_address`-related parameters are masked in the API response for our [Get Order List](get-order-list) and [Get Order Detail](get-order-detail) endpoints. For some additional context, our current address masking protocol is as follows: * Seller Shipping (**3PL**, `shipping_type=SELLER`) orders return an unmasked `recipient_address`. * TikTok Shipping (**4PL**, `shipping_type=TIKTOK`) orders...

items.title: For the SEA Market Partner & Developer: Add Expire Date on Product Certifications
items.description: # What is changing? A new attribute expiration_date was added under product certifications in APIs Check Product Listing, Create Product, Partial Edit Products and Edit Product. Before creating, publishing or editing products, please call Get Category Rules to make sure whether expiration_date is mandatory after 2025-6-28. There would be an expiration_date field under product certifications in the response body when getting category rules or getting product. The APIs include Get Category Rules a...

items.title: BR market: ZPL format support for shipping documents
items.description: ## Summary To better support our fulfillment APIs in the BR market, we've added the Zebra Programming Language (ZPL) format to our [Get Package Shipping Document](get-package-shipping-document) endpoint. ## Affected markets and versions This change applies to the following market(s): * Brazil (BR) This change applies to the following API version(s): * 202309 (and later) ## API changes ### Fulfillment APIs | **Endpoint(s)** | **Change(s)** | | --- | --- | | * Get Package Shipping Document | * Add...

items.title: US market: TikTok Shipping label allocation
items.description: ## Summary When buying a shipping label through TikTok Shop, TikTok Shipping (4PL) will be updated to automatically allocate the best logistics service for each package. This label allocation feature will initially rollout to selected sellers, and will require apps to support some minor changes in fulfillment logic. ## Impact | | | | --- | --- | | Impacted market(s) | * United States (US) | | Impacted version(s) | * 202309 (or later) | ## Changes For selected sellers with orders where `shipping_...

items.title: BR market: Updated API workflow to support Order, Invoice and Warehouse
items.description: ## Summary In the Brazil market, marketplace sellers are required to upload invoices to marketplace before they can fulfill the order. So the API workflow has been adjusted and new fields added to fit into the invoicing process. ## Affected Markets and Versions This change applies to the BR market and v202309 of the API. ## API Changes Please refer to the [developer guide](https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/YOIKdbMUtotNTFxNjx2chiitnOd) on how to manage BR market by effectively using the in...

items.title: Mandatory certifications for certain categories added
items.description: ## Summary TikTok Shop is implementing new Mandatory Certifications for categories in Beauty & Personal Care and Health. Starting from 2025-04-19, Products API will be updated to require 510(k) PreMarket Notification for Class 2 Consumer Medical Products and Establishment Registration & Device Listing Account (FURLS) for Class 1, 2, and 3 Consumer Medical Products. ## Which markets and versions are affected? This change applies to all versions and local sellers in the US market. ## API Changes D...

items.title: Upload Product Image and Upload Product File support more file formats
items.description: ## Summary File formats supported by Upload Product Image and Upload Product File have been expanded. ## Which markets and versions are affected? This change applies to **v202309** and affects all markets and sellers. ## API Changes ### Upload Product Image We now support WEBP, HEIC, and BMP in addition to the previously supported JPG, JPEG, and PNG formats. ### Upload Product File For video formats, we support MP4, MOV, MKV, WMV, WEBM, AVI, 3GP, FLV, and MPEG, in addition to the previously supp...

items.title: Adding co-founded shipping discount fields
items.description: ## What is changing? You can improve your order details page to better display Co-Funded Free Shipping (CFFS) in select US and UK markets. These updates will clarify how much sellers will be reimbursed when CFFS applies, enhancing their understanding of the program compared to previous Free Shipping initiatives. The changes are expected to improve the seller experience while reducing confusion and support inquiries. ## Which markets and versions are affected? This change applies to local sellers...
